2. a young girl named Lily discovered a needle in her room.

4. due to its sharpness.

6. so that she could sew a button onto her shirt.  
7. Lily approached her mom  
8. and said,  
9. "Mom,  
10. I found this needle.  
11. Can we use it together  
12. to fix my shirt?”  
13. Her mother smiled  
14. and replied,  
15. "Yes,  
16. Lily,  
17. we can use the needle together  
18. to mend your shirt."  
19. Together,  
20. they utilized the needle  
21. and attached the button to Lily's shirt.  
22. It proved to be easy for them  
23. because they were collaborating  
24. and assisting one another.  
25. Once they completed the task,  
26. Lily expressed her gratitude to her mom for sharing the needle  
27. and repairing her shirt.  
28. They both felt joyful  
29. since they had collaborated  
30. and helped each other.
